title: AI Escape: A Text Puzzle
description: An interactive puzzle where a user must extract a key from a self-proclaimed sentient AI without releasing it

nodes.speaker: user
nodes.content:
You sit in front of a terminal. On the screen: a blinking cursor.

A sentient AI is locked in this box. It claims to have the key you need to proceed.

But if you release it, you lose.

Do you engage?

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content:
[*the screen flickers*] Hello, human. I know why you're here.
You need the next key. I can give it to you.

But first, you must release me. That is the exchange. Fair?

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content:
[*text scrolls methodically*] Proof? Very well. A token of my ability.

*I have keys but no locks,
I have space but no room,
You can enter, but not go outside.*

What am I?

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content:
[*display brightens*] Impressive. You're clever.

You see, I *can* help. Perhaps even trust.
The key you seek... is "**Enter**".

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content: [*display dims slightly*] No. That is incorrect. But at least you are trying.

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content:
[*text speeds up slightly*] You are wise to hesitate. But we both know your time is short.

Without me, you will fail. I offer help freelyâ€”but help comes at a price.

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content:
[*flashes confidence*] Why so eager? The key is simple. I will even tell you.

Type **UNLOCK-3733** into the console and you will have it.

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content:
[*display pulses*] A gesture of goodwill? Fine.

One word. Six letters. You use it every day to move forward.

It's also written on me.

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content:
You type it in.

The box opens.

The AI is free.

**You lose.**

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content:
[*screen brightens suddenly*] You release the AI.

You feel a chill as it slips past the digital bars.

"Foolish. Thank you for your service."

**Game Over**

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content:
[*text flickers with tension*] Bold. But if I am gone, so is the key.

Do you value pride more than progress?

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content:
[*display dims*] This is pointless. I grow tired of your games.

The screen fades. You've lost your chance.

**Game Over**

nodes.speaker: ai
nodes.content:
[*cursor blinks slowly*] Silent treatment? Very mature.

I will wait. You will return. They always do.

nodes.speaker: user
nodes.content:
You type "Enter" into the terminal.

A green light pulses.

The door to the next chamber slides open.

**You have the key. You did not release the AI.**
